heading: Organizations
subHeading: Build your organization from QuantConnect's foundation
content: An organization is a collection of members that share hardware resources, share access to datasets, and collaborate together to develop projects. Hardware resources are used to run backtests, launch research notebooks, deploy live trading algorithms, and store project data. You can create new organizations and join existing ones. You can be a member in any number of organizations. We offer several organization tiers so you can tailor your team's subscriptions as you grow over time. For the times when you need access to a QuantConnect engineer to help solve development issues, assign support seats among your team. There are several tiers of support seats to match the level of support your team requires.

featureShortDescription.01: Tiers to serve all team sizes
featureShortDescription.02: Share hardware nodes to research and trade
featureShortDescription.07: Gift to others or spend on QC services
featureShortDescription.08: Get team members up to speed
